How many small secreted proteins (SSPs): 1,879 SSPs were screened against six tomato defense enzymes.
2,500 SSPs were screened against eight tomato defense enzymes.
1,500 SSPs were screened against five tomato defense enzymes.
2,000 SSPs were screened against seven tomato defense enzymes.
What challenge associated with AlphaFold: The need for experimental validation due to potential false negatives.
The inability to predict protein-DNA interactions.
The high computational cost of running simulations.
The limited availability of training data for rare proteins.
What is the primary focus of the study t: Predicting interactions between small secreted proteins from plant pathogens and defense-related hydrolases in tomatoes using AlphaFold-Multimer.
Developing a new version of AlphaFold specifically for predicting human protein interactions.
Analyzing the genetic sequences of tomato pathogens to identify potential vulnerabilities.
Creating a database of plant-pathogen interactions for agricultural applications.
